definitions.text: the act of going to see some person or place or thing for a short time
examples: he dropped by for a visit

definitions.text: a meeting arranged by the visitor to see someone (such as a doctor or lawyer) for treatment or advice
examples: he scheduled a visit to the dentist

definitions.text: the act of visiting in an official capacity (as for an inspection)
the act of going to see some person in a professional capacity
a temporary stay (e.g., as a guest)
go to see a place, as for entertainment
examples: We went to see the Eiffel Tower in the morning

definitions.text: go to certain places as for sightseeing

examples: The mayor likes to call on some of the prominent citizens

definitions.text: come to see in an official or professional capacity
examples: The grant administrator visited the laboratory
The principal visited his rage on the students

definitions.text: talk socially without exchanging too much information
examples: the men were sitting in the cafe and shooting the breeze
Every summer, we visited our relatives in the country for a month
He was visited with a terrible illness that killed him quickly
